verbose_text: Changes in binding of glutamate receptor, gene expression, and subunit protein expression, especially decreased GluN1 expression, in the prefrontal cortex [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], thalamus [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], hippocampus [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], and cerebellum [XREF_BIBR] are shown using postmortem brain of patients with schizophrenia.
